setup.description: If this is your first time signing into the IFS, you need to complete your registration. You can re-visit this page at any time to change your options.
setup.name: setupOptions

options.info: Toggle the switch left if you would like to opt-out.
options.description: The IFS is an experiment in student learning and engagement. To be part of this experiment, we need to collect some data on your general use and behaviour. Any individual information gathered during your usage will not be shared and will be used only for research purposes. Opting out of the experiment will turn off the experiment's surveys but all other features will remain available.
options.name: optin
